headline: Assessing Applied Materials Stock After Recent Price Drop and Ongoing Semiconductor Market Volatility
summary: If you are trying to figure out what to do with shares of Applied Materials, you are not alone. Many investors are in the same situation, watching a stock that has climbed steadily for years and then recently declined. Applied Materials may have dipped 1.1% over the past week and dropped 10.7% for the month, but over longer time frames, the company is still up a remarkable 81.1% in three years and an impressive 175.7% over five years. Despite some short-term turbulence, these figures reflect...
